Title: Paragraph
data: The Midst is a project combining an art-game playable online and a teaching workshop to discover tools for creative coding on the web such as ProcessingJS and Webpd. As the whole game is based on pop-up windows opening : you should desactivate the pop-up blocker of your browser.

Title: Paragraph
data: As it often happens to heroes of videos games : Hero's girlfriend has been abducted...This time it's a gang of white pixels that has accomplished the deed (the white meanies). As a consequence Hero must go through a midst of pop-ups windows to reach to his girl-friend.
